      • simplify

        public void simplify(Turtle turtle,
                     MakelangeloRobotSettings settings)
        Offers to optimize your gcode by chopping out very short line segments. It travels the entire path and drops any pen-down segment shorter than minimumStepSize.
        Parameters:
        turtle -
        settings -
